Biography

REDSHIRT SENIOR (2023)

One of five Bulldogs to start all 12 games ... Registered 74 tackles, including one for loss, a forced fumble, interception and two pass breakups ... Had the game-sealing interception in the season-opening win over FIU (Aug. 26) ... Posted a season-high 11 tackles and a pass breakup against North Texas (Sept. 16) ... Recorded a tackle for loss and a pass breakup at Jacksonville State (Nov. 18) ... Forced a fumble at UTEP (Sept. 29).

REDSHIRT JUNIOR (2022)

Appeared in all 12 games, making six starts ... Ranked fourth on the team in tackles with 56 (35 solo, 21 assisted) ... Led LA Tech with three forced fumbles and six tackles for loss ... Recorded an interception against UTEP (Oct. 8) ... Had a season-high six tackles at Middle Tennessee ... Recorded a sack against Middle Tennessee (Nov.5) and Charlotte (Nov. 19).

MIAMI (OHIO) (2018-21)

Appeared in 28 games, recording 38 tackles and two pass breakups in 2021 ... Tallied 76 tackles, two sacks, two pass breakups and a fumble recovery ... Was a member of the RedHawks 2019 MAC Championship team.

HIGH SCHOOL

Prepped at Princeton High School in Sharonville, Ohio ... Earned first-team all-conference honors as a senior ... Also lettered in track and field
